column4: anyone know of an app (thats not compiz related) that allows windows to snap together on the edges & stay stuck kinda like how winamp does it for windows?
theres window managers that have   'snaping' features.
is there a feature in nautilus or metacity that i'm missing?
not sure.  im using compiz at the moment. so the windows sort have a edge reistance that works fine for me.
